name: Chiaki
description: Small Installer that grabs Chiaki v1.2.0 from Github and executes the PSN AccountID script to setup Chiaki.
notes:
- Python3 is required to run the PSN AccountID script.
- Since PSN accounts are stored local this runs fine and doesnt overwrite previous install configs.

execute.description:
------------------------------      Obtaining your PSN AccountID:      ------------------------------
Starting with PS4 7.0, it is necessary to use a so-called "AccountID" as opposed to the "Online-ID" for registration. This ID seems to be a unique identifier for a PSN Account and it can be obtained from the PSN after logging in using OAuth. Once you know your ID, write it down. You will likely never have to do this process again. This step is only required on first install. Updates don`t require it. Close the Terminal window to continue.

content:
script:
  files:
  - Chiaki-AppImage: https://github.com/thestr4ng3r/chiaki/releases/download/v1.2.0/Chiaki-v1.2.0-Linux-x86_64.AppImage
  - psn-account-id: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/thestr4ng3r/chiaki/master/scripts/psn-account-id.py
  game:
    exe: $GAMEDIR/Chiaki-v1.2.0-Linux-x86_64.AppImage
    working_dir: $GAMEDIR
  installer:
  - chmodx: $CACHE/psn-account-id/psn-account-id.py
  - execute:
      command: python3 $CACHE/psn-account-id/psn-account-id.py
      description: '                  ------------------------------      Obtaining
        your PSN AccountID:      ------------------------------

        Starting with PS4 7.0, it is necessary to use a so-called "AccountID" as opposed
        to the "Online-ID" for registration. This ID seems to be a unique identifier
        for a PSN Account and it can be obtained from the PSN after logging in using
        OAuth. Once you know your ID, write it down. You will likely never have to
        do this process again. This step is only required on first install. Updates
        don`t require it. Close the Terminal window to continue.'
      terminal: true
  - move:
      description: Moving Executable
      dst: $GAMEDIR/
      src: $CACHE/Chiaki-AppImage/Chiaki-v1.2.0-Linux-x86_64.AppImage
  - chmodx: $GAMEDIR/Chiaki-v1.2.0-Linux-x86_64.AppImage
  system:
    disable_runtime: true
    terminal: false
